thread.title: BRIEF-BioLineRx Announces Notice of Allowance From USPTO for Patent Covering Immunotherapy for Treating Solid Tumors

title: BRIEF-BioLineRx Announces Notice of Allowance From USPTO for Patent Covering Immunotherapy for Treating Solid Tumors
text: 27 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-BioLineRx Announces Notice of Allowance From USPTO for Patent Covering Immunotherapy for Treating Solid Tumors Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Bioline Rx Ltd: * BIOLINERX ANNOUNCES NOTICE OF ALLOWANCE FROM USPTO FOR PATENT COVERING AGI-134 - A NOVEL IMMUNOTHERAPY FOR TREATING SOLID TUMORS * BIOLINE RX LTD - ‍THIS PATENT, WHEN ISSUED, WILL BE VALID UNTIL MAY 2035 WITH A POSSIBILITY OF UP TO FIVE YEARS PATENT TERM EXTENSION​ * BIOLINE RX LTD - ‍ADDITIONAL CORRESPONDING PATENT APPLICATIONS FOR AGI-134 ARE PENDING IN EUROPE, JAPAN, CHINA, CANADA, AUSTRALIA AND ISRAEL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
